original: Sārammaṇaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: sa ārammaṇam kusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ na kusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Sārammaṇaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasārammaṇo naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: sa ārammaṇam akusalam dhammam paṭicca na sa ārammaṇaḥ na akusalaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka

original: Anārammaṇaṁ abyākataṁ dhammaṁ paccayā naanārammaṇo naabyākato dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: anārammaṇam abyākatam dhammam paccayā na anārammaṇaḥ na abyākataḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
